user_query: I'm developing an e-learning platform that requires voiceovers in different languages. Can you suggest a speaker who can perform in multiple languages? Additionally, I need to know the currently supported languages for text to speech. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Research and gather information on available voiceover artists who specialize in multilingual voiceovers.
Obtain data on the currently supported languages for text to speech functionality.
Compile a list of recommended speakers based on the gathered information from subtask 1 and match their supported languages with the data from subtask 2.
